original_title: Fallen Tree Blocks Gregory Road in Colombo, Disrupting Traffic
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st);  Commuters faced significant disruptions as a large tree fell across Gregory Road, Colombo 7
The incident completely blocked the busy thoroughfare, causing major traffic congestion in the area.
Police officials at the scene confirmed that the fallen tree also damaged an electric pole.
Motorists were advised to avoid Gregory Road in the meantime and seek alternative routes.
